title: Why are OCE transfers disabled?
body:
//SOLVED//

I tried transferring my EUNE account to OCE but the client didn't give the option, so I thought EUNE must be one of those regions where OCE transfers weren't possible, so I transfered to NA since Riot Support said they allow for OCE transfers, but NA doesn't have it either.

I've just logged onto the OCE client under a new account, and I notice that no transfers are possible at.

I've tried contacting Support, but to no avail :(

Not only that, but on none of the Boards do I see a Riot post talking about no OCE transfers.

replies.body: Transfers to and from Oceania have been disabled since Tuesday morning while they try to fix an issue. You may have to wait a couple of days before transfers are available again.

And where's the post explaining this? Not on the OCE Boards... Would be nice if they communicated better with the players.

Literally lost 2,600 RP because of this... {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

The server status page, which is also tied to the little exclamation marks in client and on the website is designed to inform players of that sort of thing. Having an issue? That's the *first* place you look.

Did you just ask support if you could transfer from NA to OCE, or did you actually ask if there was a reason you couldn't from EUNE? I find it hard to believe that support would tell you that transfers from EUNE weren't possible, since the only regions that are transfer restricted/locked are Korea and Garena.

Support might be able to help you get to OCE without spending more RP since you only transferred to NA with the express purpose of making it to OCE, but they have no _obligation_ to, so I'd strongly recommend being **polite** about it. 

FYI transfers are also unavailable on patch days until both servers are on the same patch.

Unfortunately, there were no exclamation marks on the NA or EUNE client :( And I was only on the OCE client to briefly look at their region transfer section, but by then I'd already transfered to NA.

Sorry for being short (? that the word ?) with you. Just a bit annoyed is all.

Thanks for the explanations :)

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

I must apologise as well, I was under the impression you had actually ticketed support (their contact service), not just browsed the articles. They get a lot of crap they don't deserve and I got defensive, but that's no excuse so I'm sorry for that.

Outside of regular maintenance these sorts of transfer issues tend to be very short notice (a change that shouldn't have affected transfers was made and did, or the proper people weren't notified in time that a change might affect transfers, something unexpectedly breaks etc.), so communication to other regions isn't always the best (since it's *technically* just an OCE issue).

My point about support being able to help you still stands. Once transfers become available again, if you contact support and explain that there was some confusion with the articles that resulted in you purchasing a transfer you didn't need, in the hopes of getting to the server you wanted, they may be able to do something for you (but again, they have no obligation, don't go in expecting a yes).

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If you have any dramas come back to boards and we can usually point you in the right direction.
As your thread has been marked as solved, I'll be closing comments here shortly. For any further questions or concerns, please create a new thread!
